It's a simple list with nothing but padding. Good for very simple items.

.paddedList

Simple .paddedList

  • List items are divided...

  • This doesn't need any special "first" or "last" classes

  • You can subdivide these list items into columns with the standard grid, if you like

 <div class="doc-box">
	<div class="doc-content">
		<h3>Simple <code>.paddedList</code></h3>
		<ul class="paddedList">
			<li><p>List items are divided...</p></li>
			<li><p>This doesn't need any special 
				"first" or "last" classes</p>
			</li>
			<li><p>You can subdivide these list items into columns 
				with the standard grid, if you like</p>
			</li>
		</ul>
	</div>
</div>
